name: iKasa
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
iKasa skill for Amazon Alexa is to enable Echo Show toview the camera added on the iKasa App.

1. After downloading the iKasa App, login or register the iKasa account
2. Open the Alexa App to search iKasa skill for AmazonAlexa and enable it, and then the Alexa-supported camera willdisplay on the All devices page of the Alexa App.After that, the user can watch the streaming of the camerathrough the Alexa device and talk to the person in front of the camera.

After adding a new camera or deleting a camera in iKasa App, the camera will appear or disappear on the All devicespage of the Amazon Alexa App.

lf you want to view the streaming of the camera, you can say:
"Alexa, show me the yard."
"Alexa, show me the camera.'

lf you want to pause, you can say:
"Alexa, stop."
"Alexa, go home."

lf you share the camera with others in the iKasa App, they can also use the Alexa device to watch the camera's streaming
